short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays points & miles costs for flights on Google Flights and hotel information!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the best flight deals with AwardTravel, the ultimate Chrome extension for savvy travelers. Seamlessly integrated with Google Flights, AwardTravel displays the cost of flights in points and miles from all major US airlines, including American, Alaska, Delta, JetBlue, and United. It also shows how many Amex Membership Rewards points you'll need for each flight.

Key Features:
- In-line results: View points and miles prices directly on Google Flights
- Supports major US airlines: American, Alaska, Delta, JetBlue, United
- Amex Membership Rewards: See how many points you'll need
- Works on Google Hotels: Also check points & miles prices for hotels

With AwardTravel, you can easily compare flight prices in both cash and loyalty program currencies, helping you make informed decisions and maximize your travel rewards. Whether you're a frequent flyer or an occasional traveler, AwardTravel is the perfect companion for finding the best value flights.

AwardTravel is the companion Chrome extension to AwardTravel.co, the web-app that tells you the cost of hotels in points & miles. Upgrade your travel planning with AwardTravel and start booking smarter today!
